Paragraph: Furthermore , Rg1 showed a tendency to aggravate OIH in the acetic acid - induced writhing test .

| --- |
| Osteoclast-mediated Osteoporosis (Osteoporosis Induced by Hypoxia - OIH) |

The modifying term "osteoclast-mediated" describes the mechanism of the disease but is not considered a separate disease entity. Therefore, the valid disease entity is presented as "Osteoporosis Induced by Hypoxia - OIH".
